articles.title: Ukraine President On Why He Won't Hold Peace Talks With Russia - NDTV
articles.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky on Friday ruled out talks with Russia as he met with a delegation of African leaders.
articles.content:
The delegation is to meet with Russian President Vladimir Putin on Saturday.
Kyiv: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky on Friday ruled out talks with Russia as he met with a delegation of African… [+1171 chars]
